name: PROMETHEUS (Wahooney)
description:
Defend the Carrier for as long as possible from ever increasing waves of attacks from Raider and Ethereal ships. Your ship will respawn as long as your Carrier is still alive. To increase your ships battery capacity and energy regeneration rate destroy asteroids and collect the resources (purple crystals) within.

Controls W / AForward / BackwardS / DTurn Left / RightSpace / ControlFire WeaponShiftEngine Boost
Weapons 1Mass Driver2Rapid Fire Mass Driver3Gauss Bank (basically a shotgun)4Plasma Cannon5Disruptor6Missile. USE WITH CAUTION

This is an ANCIENT (2005) prototype my brother and I made on our custom engine. Mostly uploading this to preserve it for future generations.
